page.title: 07GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: 1.Outdoors:-{Netball}is a game for{14} girls,{7}on each side. You need{2 tall {poles}with a{ring}at the top, one at each end of the{court}on which the game is played. You{score}by throwing the{ball}so that it falls through the {ring}. {Rush}is a game for any number of{players.}Two people are{on.} If your name is called you must{run across the{play area}without being caught by those who are{on.}If{you} succeed then{everyone else}must follow you.If you are{caught}you{join}those who are{on}and then call{someone else to run across. 2.Indoor:-{Snakes & Ladders}is a board game with{100 squares}some have{snakes on, some have{ladders.}A{dice}is thrown to move along the board. If you {land}on a{ladder}you{go up}it; if you{ {land}on a{snake}you{go down}it. The first to reach 100{wins}.
